text: Ever Gabo Anderson (born November 3, 2007) is an American actress and model. She is known for portraying a young "Natasha Romanoff" in the 2021 movie Black Widow. ==Movies== Year Title Role Notes 2016 Resident Evil: The Final Chapter Young Alicia Marcus / Red Queen 2021 Black Widow Young Natasha Romanoff 2022 Peter Pan & Wendy Wendy Darling Post-production 2022 Helvellyn Edge Harley Filming ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Living people Category:2007 births Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:Models from Los Angeles
title: Ever Anderson
